entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ensure Local Constant Usage is Tracked in Local function and Lambda Parameter Attributes #63911
  • Add `SymbolDisplayFormat.CSharpText` #63906
    C# 12.0
  • Allow [module: RefSafetyRules] attribute in source #63904
  • Test comment references wrong compiler error code #63898
  • Implement ref safety analysis as a BoundNodeVisitor #63897
  • Avoid binding lambda expressions unnecessarily in error scenarios #63896
  • Code cleanup is missing option to remove empty lines #63895
  • IDE Usage Analysis Does Not Account for Lambda Default Parameters #63892
  • Source generators have exploded the costs of making skeleton references. #63891
  • Default Parameter Values Not Supported By QuickInfo for Anonymous Delegate Types #63890
    17.5
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63888
    17.4
  • Project.CompilationOutputInfo doesn't resolve a situation with Directory.Build.props case #63886
    Backlog
  • `langword` value is not colorized correctly in doc comments #63885
    Backlog
  • Generate Method generates doubly nullable struct types when used with null coalescing operator #63883
  • Create a table to store data so we can track the average number of yellow bars a user sees in a release #63881

Closed

  • Low level struct improvements allow returning references to a current method's stack #62850
    17.4
  • Feature request: Add generators execution times to `/reportanalyzer` #63887
  • Find References additional filter options #63875

PullRequests

Created

  • Replace Razor Source Generator reference with one loaded from a VSIX #63912
    Area-IDE
  • Add feature flag #63910
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Additional Test Coverage For Lambda Default Parameters #63909
    Area-Compilers
  • Improve readability of EnC log in memory dumps #63908
    Area-Interactive
  • Disable quickinfo on new inline rename #63907
    Area-IDE
  • Update vs-extension-testing to 0.1.145-beta #63903
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move 'Todo Comments' to EA pattern (redux) #63902
    Area-IDE
  • fixed a comment to clarify correct error code in the test. fixes #63898 #63901
    Area-Compilers, Test, Community
  • Colorize langword inside doc comments #63900
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Use common pattern for traits in tests #63893
    Area-IDE
  • Fix type inference in coalesce expression #63884
    Area-IDE
  • Compiler outputs #63882
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #63880
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1987893 #63879

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63905
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix integration tests by not listening to value changed for old UI #63865
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Revert "Move 'Todo Comments' to EA pattern" #63889
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • When shrinking breakpoints down to less lines, stick to the end of the range #63731
    Area-IDE
  • Support changing return types of methods, properties, events #63486
    Area-Interactive
  • Update DefiniteAssignment Pass to Account for Local Default Parameter Values #63850
    Area-Compilers
  • First Draft of Common Language Server Protocol Framework (CLaSP) #62924
    Area-IDE
  • Non positional option for Convert To Record #63848
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Propagate In/Out attributes on local functions #63824
    Area-Compilers
  • Use net7.0 in source-build #62916
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Use frozen partial semantic for import completion in OOP #63862
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid binding lambdas unnecessarily in some error scenarios #59733
    Area-Compilers
  • Fixes implementation of With methods of recoverable trees #63876
    Area-IDE
  • Some improvements to Workspace.CanApplyChanges #63701
    Area-IDE
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Unify handling of directive parsing accross multiple code paths #63832
    Area-Compilers
  • Guard against a regular stack overflow exception in ControlFlowGraphBuilder. #63854
    Area-Compilers, Feature - IOperation
  • Enforce SetsRequiredMembers nullability on implicit chained constructors #63790
    Area-Compilers
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Add support for Suppression/Configuration fixes for build-only diagno… #63835
    Area-IDE
  • Check method arguments must match for property accessors #63809
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Do not go back from Solution snapshot to Workspace in Metadata-as-Source #63869
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for delete parameter intent #63546
    Area-IDE
